regions.text:
Q1-A: Regression Analysis
        Given: n=10, ΣX=900, ΣY=700, ΣX²=6360, ΣY²=2860, ΣXY=3900
        
        Solution:
        y = 0.613x + 13.87
        x = 1.178y - 15.43
        Correlation coefficient r = 0.863
        
        Q1-B: Sales Prediction
        Given: Mean sales = 40 Cr, Mean advertisement = 6 Cr
        SD sales = 10, SD advertisement = 1.5, r = 0.9
        
        For advertisement expenditure = 10 crores:
        Estimated sales = 40.6 crores
        
        Q2-A: Hypothesis Test
        H₀: μ = 50, H₁: μ ≠ 50
        Sample: n=25, x̄=55, s=10
        Z = 2.236
        Conclusion: Reject H₀
        
        Q2-B: Quality Control
        Before: p₁ = 0.05, n₁ = 1000
        After: p₂ = 0.03, n₂ = 1200
        Z = 1.897, p-value = 0.029
        Conclusion: Significant improvement

ocr_results.full_text:
Q1-A: Regression Analysis
        Given: n=10, ΣX=900, ΣY=700, ΣX²=6360, ΣY²=2860, ΣXY=3900
        
        Solution:
        y = 0.613x + 13.87
        x = 1.178y - 15.43
        Correlation coefficient r = 0.863
        
        Q1-B: Sales Prediction
        Given: Mean sales = 40 Cr, Mean advertisement = 6 Cr
        SD sales = 10, SD advertisement = 1.5, r = 0.9
        
        For advertisement expenditure = 10 crores:
        Estimated sales = 40.6 crores
        
        Q2-A: Hypothesis Test
        H₀: μ = 50, H₁: μ ≠ 50
        Sample: n=25, x̄=55, s=10
        Z = 2.236
        Conclusion: Reject H₀
        
        Q2-B: Quality Control
        Before: p₁ = 0.05, n₁ = 1000
        After: p₂ = 0.03, n₂ = 1200
        Z = 1.897, p-value = 0.029
        Conclusion: Significant improvement
